attributes.action: refuse any benefits or homes to illegal immigrants and any other immigrants. we should be detering them from coming to britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is nothing to do with racism it just that britain needs to stay british, sooner or later the british will be out numbered in our own country. by having so many immigrants in britain unemployment is rising among british people, we do not have enough homes to accomodate people already here let alone anyone else coming over here. the more unemployment and immigrants the more our already high taxes will be raised or other services cut to pay for them ie housing benefit, medical care, job seekers allowance or family benefit.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic already:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=immigration
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
